io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.effectbuilder

Class FlowEffectBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.effectbuilder.FlowEffectBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EffectBuilder

    public class FlowEffectBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements EffectBuilder
    A small helper class for easily creating new flow-type effects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FlowEffectBuilder()
      Creates an instance of the FlowEffectBuilder
